title: Miss Mistery Gift
body:
Hey! 
I received the free mystery skin for good behavior in 2014 but this skin is "Mordekaiser  Dragon Knight". This skin isnt In the lista of Mordekaiser's skins.. It was retired or i guess that. What i can do? I want some skin T.T

replies.body: I can't find my gift either. I dunno what I got
What do you mean?  You got Dragon Knight Mordekaiser.  I can see him in your account.  Maybe try playing a custom game alone and selecting the skin.  You should be able to use it.
Dragon Knight Mordekaiser was put in the Legacy Vault a few years ago.  I believe the OP is talking about the skin not being in the store's list of skins for that champion.

Ahh, well most Legacy skins are eligible for mystery gifting.  If you have questions about mystery gifting in general you can go here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ

You can also go here to see what is Legacy:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Champion-Skin-Types
